attributes.action: reduce the price of admission to stafford rangers football club
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: season 06/07 stafford rangers increased there prices to 12 pounds for an adult and 8 pounds for a child to see stafford rangers play, were not a big club and we are only in the conference. Comparing prices we were shocked to see that blackbrun charge the same prices for children that we do for children and they are in the premiership. please put pressure on the club to reduce adults to ten pounds and children to 5 pounds

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
